snippet.title: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf -A Tale of Cutthroat Lovers- OP Movie
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2947970?utm_source=youtubeen

In this twisted love story of a visual novel by CLOCKUP, an insomniac must decide whether to protect his position as a yakuza bigwig’s pet killer or the mysterious woman who can put him to sleep.

Subscribe & Follow Shiravune for our latest news:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/shiravune/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shiravune
Discord: https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy
Website: https://shiravune.com/
